63.eng-name: Merits of the Helpers in Madinah (Ansaar)

hadiths.text: Narrated `Umar:The pagans used not to leave Jam' (i.e. Muzdalifa) till the sun had risen on Thabir mountain. The Prophet contradicted them by leaving (Muzdalifa) before the sun rose

chapter.eng-name: The days of Pre-Islamic Period of Ignorance
